tool_description: Evaluates the safety and quality of individual ingredients in pet food, identifying potentially harmful substances and providing safety ratings.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients to evaluate for safety

species.description: Target pet species: dog, cat, rabbit, bird, or ferret

error_messages: Empty ingredients list: Provide at least one ingredient to evaluate
Unsupported species: Use one of [dog, cat, rabbit, bird, ferret]
Unrecognized ingredient: Some ingredients could not be identified in safety database
Too many ingredients: Maximum 50 ingredients can be evaluated at once
usage: Provide a list of ingredients and target species. The tool will evaluate each ingredient for safety and provide warnings for potentially harmful substances.

warning_ingredients.description: List of ingredients with safety concerns

safety_notes.description: Detailed safety notes for concerning ingredients
